old: (n : ℕ) (x y : ℕ → ℕ) : ∑ i in Finset.range n, x i * y i ≥ 1 / n * (∑ i in Finset.range n, x i) * (∑ i in Finset.range n, y i) := by
new: (f : ℕ → ℕ) (n : ℕ) : ∑ i in Finset.range n, f i / n ≤ ∑ i in Finset.range n, f i:= by
(x y z : ℝ) : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y ∧ 0 < z → 0 < x * y * z ∧ 0 < x * y * z * (x * y + x * z + y * z) ∧ 0 < x * y * z * (x * y + x * z + y * z) * (x * z + x * y + y * z):= by
